Question
========

The figure below shows a plot of the regression lines of four individuals from a sample for the relationship between Time on the X-axis and Y on the Y-axis. The figure is based on a linear mixed modeling analysis for repeated measures.

Which statement belongs to the figure?

![](vufgb-multilevelanalysis-013-nl-figure01.jpg)
  
Answerlist
----------
* Intercept and slope are random.
* Intercept is random, slope is fixed.
* Intercept is fixed, slope is random.
* Intercept and slope are fixed.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
